SQL.LOAD: SELECT code, description, retry_count, retry_delay_seconds, timeout_seconds, task_parameters, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, task_id FROM elp_task WHERE task_id = :task_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select task_id, code, description, retry_count, retry_delay_seconds, timeout_seconds, task_parameters FROM elp_task t where 1=1 --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_task SET code = :code, description = :description, retry_count = :retry_count, retry_delay_seconds = :retry_delay_seconds, timeout_seconds = :timeout_seconds, task_parameters = :task_parameters, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE task_id = :task_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_task ( code, description, retry_count, retry_delay_seconds, timeout_seconds, task_parameters, created_by, task_id ) VALUES ( :code, :description, :retry_count, :retry_delay_seconds, :timeout_seconds, :task_parameters, :created_by, :task_id )
